thread.title: Dawn Mckinlay
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Dawn Mckinlay

author: Dawn Mckinlay
title: Dawn Mckinlay
text: Ordered wrong size, emailed country attire and got a reply straight away, as soon as they received item back they emailed me to let me know, I reordered anther one in a smaller size and got it the very next day. I can't recommend them enough.
